author: Blake Schuster
title: Serge Ibaka to Host IG Live Talent Show; Will Donate $20K to COVID-19 Relief
description: Toronto Raptors  big man  Serge Ibaka  can't play much basketball at the moment, so he's instead turning to Instagram to see what other ways there are to stay entertained...
content:
Rocky Widner/Getty Images
Toronto Raptors big man Serge Ibaka can't play much basketball at the moment, so he's instead turning to Instagram to see what other ways there are to stay entertained.
While the NBA remains on hiatus because of the coronavirus pan… [+1529 chars]
